functions.tag: {CustomModelData:58,display:{Name:'{"translate":"コーンスープの鍋","color":"yellow","italic":false,"bold":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"心が温まるスープが特盛に入った鍋","color":"#FFE3AF","italic":false}','{"translate":"飲むとHPがじわじわと回復する","color":"#FFE3AF","italic":false}','{"translate":"熱いので少量ずつしか飲めない","color":"#FFE3AF","italic":false}','[{"text":"","color":"white","italic":false},{"text":"C","font":"icon","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" コーンスープ"}]','{"text":"---TUSBMemory---","obfuscated":true,"color":"gray","italic":false}']},Skill:{Type:"TUSBMemory",Initializing:1b,Job:"共通",Name:"コーンスープ",Level:1,Interval:250,Trigger:"手に持って右クリック",Count:30},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.7,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,0,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:0.7,Operation:0,UUID:[I;12,0,0,40],Slot:"offhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:10,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:1.2,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
